original_solution_mapping.L1: Jerry had 63 pieces of candy / 9 bags = <<63/9=7>>7 pieces of candy per bag.
original_solution_mapping.L2: There were chocolate hearts in 2 bags * 7 = <<2*7=14>>14 chocolate hearts.
original_solution_mapping.L3: There were chocolate kisses in 3 bags * 7 = <<3*7=21>>21 chocolate kisses.
original_solution_mapping.L4: There was a total of 21 + 14 chocolate candy = <<21+14=35>>35 chocolate.
original_solution_mapping.L5: Jerry started with 63 pieces - 35 chocolate = <<63-35=28>>28 pieces of non-chocolate candy.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4371.
    Returns: the number of pieces of candy that were not chocolate.
    """
    # L1
    total_candy_pieces = 63 # Jerry had 63 pieces of candy
    total_bags = 9 # divided them up equally into 9 bags
    candy_per_bag = total_candy_pieces / total_bags

    # L2
    chocolate_heart_bags = 2 # 2 of the bags had chocolate hearts
    chocolate_hearts_candy = chocolate_heart_bags * candy_per_bag

    # L3
    chocolate_kisses_bags = 3 # 3 of the bags were chocolate kisses
    chocolate_kisses_candy = chocolate_kisses_bags * candy_per_bag

    # L4
    total_chocolate_candy = chocolate_kisses_candy + chocolate_hearts_candy

    # L5
    non_chocolate_candy = total_candy_pieces - total_chocolate_candy

    # FA
    answer = non_chocolate_candy
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Jerry had {total_candy_pieces} pieces of candy / {total_bags} bags = <<{total_candy_pieces}/{total_bags}={candy_per_bag}>>{candy_per_bag} pieces of candy per bag.
There were chocolate hearts in {chocolate_heart_bags} bags * {candy_per_bag} = <<{chocolate_heart_bags}*{candy_per_bag}={chocolate_hearts_candy}>>{chocolate_hearts_candy} chocolate hearts.
There were chocolate kisses in {chocolate_kisses_bags} bags * {candy_per_bag} = <<{chocolate_kisses_bags}*{candy_per_bag}={chocolate_kisses_candy}>>{chocolate_kisses_candy} chocolate kisses.

There was a total of {chocolate_kisses_candy} + {chocolate_hearts_candy} chocolate candy = <<{chocolate_kisses_candy}+{chocolate_hearts_candy}={total_chocolate_candy}>>{total_chocolate_candy} chocolate.

Jerry started with {total_candy_pieces} pieces - {total_chocolate_candy} chocolate = <<{total_candy_pieces}-{total_chocolate_candy}={non_chocolate_candy}>>{non_chocolate_candy} pieces of non-chocolate candy.
